column4: Hello Ubuntu! New user here, completely made my switch a week ago from XP, just got bored with the OS and wanted to learn something new and was always curious about Linux... :) I have so many questions I don't even know where to start but I thought I'd say hello first.
you may want to begin reading some initial docs in ubuntu.com or ubuntu-guide.org just to get an idea on how things are done in linux/ubuntu
linuxprintin.org has a data base of printers/drivers
